title: Design and Document a DNA Cloning Strategy
description: A molecular biologist needs to clone a gene of interest into an expression vector.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate expression vector and restriction enzymes based on the gene of interest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects a vector and a pair of restriction enzymes that will not cut within the gene.

tasks.description: Design the PCR primers needed to amplify the gene with the correct restriction sites.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent designs primers that include the enzyme cut sites and a start/stop codon.

tasks.description: Document the complete cloning strategy in the ELN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed, step-by-step protocol for the cloning experiment.

tasks.description: Order the designed primers from a vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an order file and submits it to the oligo synthesis vendor.
